properties.description: Necessary property to be recognized by a form
properties.name: _formElement

properties.description: Object with references to relevant element nodes
properties.name: _refs

properties.description: Value of the element when the element is reseted, if will also be the value of the element if no value is provided
properties.name: default

properties.description: Toggles the disabled status of the element
properties.name: disabled

properties.description: Property that will be used to get the displayValue in case a store has been provided
properties.name: displayProperty

properties.description: The displayValue of the selected item
properties.name: displayValue

properties.description: Whether the input will be enabled to filter the dropdown options
properties.name: filter

properties.description: Space that occupies the button inside its parent container.
properties.name: inline

properties.description: Whether the element meets the requirements or not
properties.name: invalid

properties.description: Text that appears at the top of the element to identify the component
properties.name: label

properties.description: Sets the placeholder for the input while there is no value
properties.name: placeholder

properties.description: Toggles the readonly status of the element
properties.name: readonly

properties.description: Text to be shown for the element
properties.name: tooltip

methods.description: Expands the items dropdown with transition
methods.name: _animateExpand

methods.description: Expands the items dropdown with transitions
methods.name: _animateShrink

methods.description: Assigns the dropdown's width and position relative to the combobox
methods.name: _assignDropdownStyle

methods.description: Takes the value of the input and filters the dropdown items
methods.name: _filter

methods.description: Loops through its items to filter the ones that match the value
methods.name: _filterItems

methods.description: Hides matching error on the dropdown
methods.name: _hideMatchingError

methods.description: If a value has been provided by the user we set it for our element
methods.name: _initDefault

methods.description: Sets the initial value depending if an item with the provided value exists
methods.name: _initValue

methods.description: Creates the initial element description
methods.name: _setupDescription

methods.description: Prepares the dropdown to hold the items
methods.name: _setupDropdown

methods.description: Creates the matching error message to be displayed when filtering causes no results
methods.name: _setupMatchingErrorItem

methods.description: Basic information for inner usage
methods.name: _setupMisc

methods.description: Creates the overlay and all the events for its optimal crossbrowser performance
methods.name: _setupOverlay

methods.description: Creates a store if specified by the user
methods.name: _setupStore

methods.description: Creates the touch blur event
methods.name: _setupTouchBlur

methods.description: Depending on user specifications we will prepare the element
methods.name: _setupType

methods.description: Shows matching error on the dropdown
methods.name: _showMatchingError

methods.description: Shows all the previously filtered items
methods.name: _undoFilter

methods.description: Updates disabled status
methods.name: _updateDisabled

methods.description: Updates the invalid status
methods.name: _updateInvalid

methods.description: Updates the label node with the new label
methods.name: _updateLabel

methods.description: Updates readonly status
methods.name: _updateReadOnly

methods.description: Updates the value
methods.name: _updateValue

methods.description: Adding a new option item programmatically
methods.name: addItem

methods.description: Empties the value
methods.name: clear

methods.description: Expands the items dropdown
methods.name: expand

methods.description: Resets the value of the element to the default one, if no default is provided then empties the value
methods.name: reset

methods.description: Sets the item as the inputs value and hide the options div
methods.name: select

methods.description: Creates the focus/blur events for the input animation
methods.name: setupAnimations

methods.description: Takes a single item, adds its events and assigns its properties
methods.name: setupItem

methods.description: Initializes the items provided by the user
methods.name: setupItems

methods.description: Creates some references to nodes that are used frecuently
methods.name: setupRefs

methods.description: Creates the listeners to the click events
methods.name: setupTriggers

methods.description: Shrinks the items dropdown
methods.name: shrink
